name: Select
description: Dropdown selection control for choosing a single value from a list of options.

defaultValue.description: Default selected value for uncontrolled usage

onOpenChange.description: Handler called when open state changes

Trigger.description: Button that opens the dropdown. Shows selected value or placeholder.

Content.description: Container for the dropdown options. Renders when open.

Option.description: Individual selectable option with value and label.

accessibility.focusManagement: Focus moves to trigger. Arrow keys navigate options without moving focus.
accessibility.screenReader: Announces selected value, expanded/collapsed state, and option count

examples.name: Basic select
examples.code:
<Select.Root>
  <Select.Trigger placeholder="Choose option" />
  <Select.Content>
    <Select.Option value="a">Option A</Select.Option>
    <Select.Option value="b">Option B</Select.Option>
  </Select.Content>
</Select.Root>
